name: Fishing Freaks: BassRise for WonderSwan
overview: This is a fishing game that focuses only on bass fishing. The game is based on the strategic approach of selecting tackle (rods and lures) based on the lake conditions, and setting each point's situation. The player must drop a lure at the right moment and make full use of subtle rod manipulation and lure techniques to catch a bass. In the communication cable-based competitive mode, players can set up the size and weight of the fish in advance to match each other's fishing conditions, and enjoy a simultaneous two-player game. For beginners who have never tried fishing before, navigational messages are displayed during the game, so even inexperienced anglers can master all the techniques of bass fishing by playing this game.
